title: Why VAT on imported softwares does not make any sense

title: Japan firm fails in historic Moon bid
subtitle: Japanese start-up ispace conceded Wednesday its ambitious attempt to become the first private company to land on the Moon had failed but pledged to move ahead with new missions.

title: Saudi Arabia to send its first woman into space
subtitle: Rayyana Barnawi will join fellow Saudi male astronaut Ali Al-Qarni on a mission to the International Space Station (ISS) "during the second quarter of 2023", the official Saudi Press Agency said on Sunday.

title: Hubble captures mysterious ‘spokes’ gliding across Saturn’s rings
subtitle: The return of the spokes is one of the earliest signs that Saturn is entering a new season as it approaches the autumnal equinox of its northern hemisphere, which is expected to occur on May 6, 2025, for the first time in about 15 years.

title: Imported software likely to get costlier
